Body:
""" The silent option will force all writes to be bypassed.
        """
self.cmd = (
    "%(pgm)s %(in_fqfn)s                                   -d ','                                             --fieldcnt 7                                       --quoting 'quote_none'                             --outgood %(outgood)s                              --outerr  %(outerr)s                               --silent                                     "
     % {'pgm': self.pgm, 'outgood': self.outgood_fqfn, 'outerr': self.
    outerr_fqfn, 'in_fqfn': self.std_7x7_fqfn})
print(self.cmd)
runner = envoy.run(self.cmd)
self.get_outputs(runner)
print(self.std_out)
print(self.std_err)
assert self.status_code == 0
assert not self.err_output
assert not self.good_output
assert not self.std_out
assert not self.std_err or len(self.std_err
    ) < 50 and 'Coverage.py' in self.std_err
